short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Populate forms with relevant, AI-generated data for testing purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables developers to populate forms with relevant, AI-generated data for testing purposes.

I created this extension because I had a very large form to test (30+ fields) and didn't want to spend time making up values for every field.

Features:
- Populates any form with just a right-click
- Uses OpenAI gpt-4o-mini by default (but also supports gpt-4o)
- Supports custom instructions to tune the generated field values
- Free and open source

Requires an OpenAI API key.
